ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Halyburton! Nice work! If I may, just as an FYI, I am using FireFox 1.0.6 and didn t get any sound, I m guessing there was some music to be played right?
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Halyburton!
Nice work! If I may, just as an FYI, I am using FireFox 1.0.6 and
didn't get any sound, I'm guessing there was some music to be played
right? Also it was slow to load in both FF and IE6 (about 50 seconds).
you might want to add a timer or something telling the viewer to please
wait. At first I kept clicking on the screen to see if I could get it to
do something but it just sat there. The status bar said "Done" and I
almost closed it before it started. Other than that it's really good!
I'm jealous casue I can't do anything in Flash or Shockwave!

Good work!
Durgaa Silveroak
Guild leader of Mystic Crusaders EQ1 Chapter
Bristlebane Server
